A new cat faction has just formed.  My Geotrons have agreed to go and 
if they don't instantly offer a treaty when they show up destroy them. 
So far as I can tell Thunderstorm is undecided.  I said in an earlier 
post Mustex would just let Gorzo sleep since LN left without ever 
posting for him.  So go ahead and let him wake up.  Oh and don't go 
50 meter to the left, right, or in front of the Geotrons Base intrance 
Stallex planted 3 landmines he built from the ruins of Gorzo's shuttle 
hope you don't mind.  I asked it I could turn the whole shuttle into a 
nuclear missile, but rAuq said no and Rudra dissapeared.  We're 
considering a restart to the game.
